Maximiliano Cruz

Web Developer

About me

My name is Maximiliano Cruz. I'm a Front End Web Developer with some Back End, prácticas Agile, QA y DevOps background. I like to keep up to date with the latest technologies in order to provide strong and high quality software solutions.

Professional experience

Reyesoft

Web Developer - Scrum master

I joined Reyesoft as a Web Developer in the Front End team. At this company, I learnt about Agile methodologies, to the point of becoming Scrum Master. Besides working in the Front End team, I developed Desktop apps and API REST. This experiece has provided me great skills and tools as a professional developer, such as QA, DevOps y Scrum.

Freelance

Web Developer and SEO Writer

As freelancer, I have developed sites and software solutions using different frameworks and languages such as Python, Angular and Wordpress. I have also worked as a SEO writer in sites like EncuentraPrecios.es, Movical, descargar.mobi and MundoBurpee.

Ouroboros

Textile Startup

Ouroboros is startup focused on sports and workwear design and production. This project helped me to develop my leadership, self-management and projection skills.

Raffeish

Seller and Tour Guide

Working as a seller and tour guide in Valle Grande helped me to develop my social skills.

QTI

Seller

I worked as a sales representative in a QTI branch shop selling imported products.

Letter Writer

Letter Writer is a web app develped for a legal firm. It writes automatic .doc letters based on a specially formatted Excel sheet so they can be printed using Word, LibreOffice Writer or any other compatible software.

NGX Named Routes

This Angular library allows to assign names to the routes in the Angualr router, so they can be called by their name rather that writing the whole route.

Visitar NGX Named Routes

Mi portfolio

My Portfolio was developed using Jekyll, particleJS and Gulp. The first one is a static site generator written in Ruby. ParticleJS is a Javascript library that creates the moving particles of the main section. And Gulp the task mananger used to uglify the styles and JS files used in the site.

Visitar My Portfolio

Nanobox autodeploy (Reyesoft)

Nanobox Autodeploy is a Bash script that automatically deploys projects to Nanobox each time a new commit is merged to the selected branch/es.
